channel.title: Comments on: Trust
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: hondageoff
item.dc:creator: hondageoff
item.content:encoded:
Great post.

I think the other thing that should come into play is determination. I have a problem with
people who only have a ‘modular’ approach. Sure your little piece of the puzzle is great,
but you have to be willing to see the entire picture and finish the project strong. No matter
how big or small it is. When your piece is only but a morsal of a bigger picture you shouldn’t
be so close minded. This is a hard quality to possess, but it goes hand in hand with trust.
If I do not trust you to get the job done, your determination is probably low.
